about_the_game:
Right now, in a dimension an unknowable distance away, an Elven Princess, Farina, faces off against a Dark Elf, Riza, in front of the sacred tree that all elves draw their strength from. Riza has an ace up her sleeve; she sends Farina to a world without a sacred tree to draw power from. Our world! Luckily for Farina, she ends up in the bedroom of the greatest power source in all the multiverses; our horny elf-loving protagonist!

Fuck that arrogant attitude right out of Farina in every imaginable way. Get her to use her invisible magic to fuck her in public, have her cosplay as a maid/bunny girl to service you, or fuck her like the cum hungry elven pig she is with a nose hook + collar combo! She'll love whatever you can dish out baby!

Let's not forget about Riza, who assumed that without the sacred tree Farina would be lost and powerless in this new world. Little did she know what would be waiting for her when she came through the portal was our elf-addicted protagonist and a turbo cum-charged Farina to put Riza in her place as Elf Sex Pet #2.


  • Translated version of the original Japanese Visual Novel
  • Both Elves are fully voiced with original Japanese dialogue
  • Original artwork HD upscaled with 16:9 and 4:3 variants
  • Hours of story content
  • Audio including music and special effects
  • Enhanced with character sprite animations
  • Gallery and Scene selections
  • 19 scenes of dominating your elven sex pets!

Masochistic Elves from Another World! Is the English localization of a Visual Novel originally created by prolific Japanese developer Miel. We at Cherry Kiss aim to provide an authentic Japanese Visual Novel experience to gamers outside of Japan.

**PLEASE NOTE**
All characters described and visually represented in this game are over 18 years of age, and no actual, nor identifiable minor was used in the production of this game.

highlighted.name: Gives "rare drop" a whole new meaning
Taking a trip with your pet elf

content_descriptors.notes:
- Large portions of the game include nudity and graphic descriptions of sexual activities.
- There are scenes of sexual intercourse involving pregnant characters.
- Characters are blackmailed/coerced into performing sexual acts.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: When sassy elves get trapped in our reg. world, the least they could do is ask politely to be filled with a man's virile "mana". Luckily, these elves really like being punished, through rigorous training they become perfect mana receptacles for you!
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
